title: Darning Sampler, 1811
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in running stitch (pattern darning) on plain weave foundation
description: Fourteen darning crosses, inset patch in middle with crowned monogram, two inset corners and two decorative embroidered squares.

tombstone.epitaph:
Darning Sampler, 1811.
1811. Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in running stitch (pattern darning) on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-213.
